features: Close, Comfortable Shave - Wahl shave gel is formulated to give you a satisfying, smooth shave that leaves your face feeling soft, clean, & moisturized; Non-irritating clear gel formula that allows for a comfortable, close shave for reducing nicks, scrapes, & razor burn

High-Quality Ingredients - Our superior formula contains the highest quality Sativa seed, jojoba, meadowfoam seed, olive, clove, and moringa, plus many other carefully selected ingredients chosen to relieve itchiness & dryness leaving your face feeling smooth

Made for Men – Men have had to choose their grooming products from brands that specialize in women’s beauty; our products are formulated by men, exclusively for men to help them look & feel their best with an aromatic scent that doesn’t overpower
Add to Cart - Wahl’s new complete line of Wet Goods will help men maintain a fresh, well-managed look. Add Wahl to your daily grooming routine and watch the head-turning results
Complete Grooming Line - Wahl now offers a full line of Wet Goods exclusively designed and formulated for men. From beard care to shaving creams and gels to body wash, lotion, shampoo & conditioners
body.description: Wahl's Shave Gel is essential for one's daily shave routine. Our special clear formula lightly foams so it's easy to see what you are doing, especially for men with facial hair. It contains the highest quality ingredients to soften the beard and skin. The result is a nick free, close shave with the added benefit of moisturizing skin. It is acne safe and won't clog pores. Essential oil such as Manuka Oil which is similar to the antiseptic properties of tea tree but without the estrogen effect so Wahl only uses Manuka oil in their mens' products. Other oils such as Meadowfoam Seed, Clove Oil and Moringa Oils are a proprietary blend to nourish the skin and make razor blades glide across the skin to more effectively shave. Wahl shave gel is formulated to give you a satisfying, smooth shave that leaves your face feeling soft, clean, & moisturized; Non-irritating clear gel formula with a light, rich lather allows for a comfortable, close shave for reducing nicks, scrapes, & razor irritation. Wahl now offers a full line of Wet Goods exclusively designed and formulated for men. From beard care to shaving creams and gels to body wash, lotion, shampoo & conditioners. For far too long, men have had to choose their grooming products from brands that specialize in women’s beauty; our products were formulated exclusively for men to help them look their best. If you have any questions or concerns regarding your Wahl Product, contact our Customer Service Center. "My great grandfather invented the first practical hair clipper in 1919. Since then, Wahl has been a leader in supplying the barber trade. Every tool, instrument, or solution is crafted with the customer in mind. We personally stand behind our quality as it has our name on it. Thank you." - Phil Wahl, 4th Generation. Product in packaging may not be exactly the same as photo due to continuous improvements to the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this product
reviews.reviewText: A great shave gel. No lather, which is how you're supposed to shave. No nicks, cuts or abrasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Remember it only takes a small amount to cover your beard. Very effective in scalp shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for a first wet/dry razor pre-shave...
reviews.reviewText: First purchase of a wet/dry Norelco razor. Powder stick is out and replacement are, for some reason, frighteningly overpriced, so I needed an alternative. Wahl products have always performed well for me so I tried this. Well done! Very smooth shave, conditions skin as I shave, as far as I can tell, an excellent product. Would love to get back to powder sticks but, this will do until then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When other makers abandoned clear shave gels, Wahl was there to save my day. Thank you, old friend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slick and clear, with a light pleasant scent
reviews.reviewText: Since Neutrogena discontinued their men's line, I've been searching for a replacement shaving gel. My wife started getting upset at all the tubes of shave "gel" I've given up on after a few shaves. This one makes the cut, no pun intended. Its scent is very light and pleasant. It goes on easily with very little needed, and it is light enough to not clog the razor, even after a few days of not shaving. The only downside is the bottle isn't great for traveling, when space is an issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I feel like this guy is the end of a journey for me. A little melodramatic maybe, but it's the truth.I used to use shaving creams because it's what my dad always used, until I found out that shaving foam/gel is broadly superior at having a smooth shave and preventing cuts, at least for me.So I used foams in aerosol cans for a while because that's the form I always found it in at the grocery store. But using aerosol cans for this always struck me as kinda dumb. They always run out within a month, they're hard to get open and rinse before recycling, they're more resource intensive to manufacture and fill in the first place. And it's not like I have to spray the stuff all over my body, it's just my face.So I tried a few bottled gels like this and am never going back. They last forever, give a superior shave, feel better, and are easy to recycle or reuse. This is the best one I've found so far and I'm sticking with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great item for a regular razor
reviews.reviewText: Works great if using a regular razor but clogs up the heads of a electric razor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: For something advertised as a gel, I was expecting something more thick and slick to allow for less friction during the save. This product while has a great scent does not provide a good glide while shaving. Think of it as a watered-down soap without the glide the soap gives you.I must say I'm a bit let down by it and got several nicks while using but I can't say for sure if it was because of it or not since I was using a new safety razor. It does foam up a bit and it's not completely transparent either but you can tell the region you are shaving way better than regular foam.
